experience.title: Customer Service Associate
experience.description: Managed cash register transactions and assisted customers with finding products on the sales floor. Maintained a clean and organized storefront to ensure a pleasant shopping environment.

experience.title: Event Volunteer
experience.description: Handled set-up and tear-down for local community events and distributed flyers to attendees. Provided general directions and information to guests during peak hours.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Answered incoming telephone calls and directed them to the appropriate staff members. Filed physical documents and assisted with data entry tasks as requested by the office manager.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience or research done for job field.
